original_name: Djekna jos nije umrla, a ka' ce ne znamo
plot: The comic adventures of a Montenegrin family that live in an isolated village high in the mountains, eternally waiting for their son to come back from his studies in Munich.
plot_en: The comic adventures of a Montenegrin family that live in an isolated village high in the mountains, eternally waiting for their son to come back from his studies in Munich.
plot_es: The comic adventures of a Montenegrin family that live in an isolated village high in the mountains, eternally waiting for their son to come back from his studies in Munich.
title: Djekna jos nije umrla, a ka' ce ne znamo
